mapper.select: select uu.id, uu.username, uu.phone, uu.regMail, uu.regIP, uu.salt, uu.nickname, uu.status, uu.createTime, uu.lastUpdate, uu.userPicturePath, uu.maxUserPicturePath, uu.midUserPicturePath, uu.minUserPicturePath, uu.points, uu.exp, uu.vipLevel,usernameModifiedTimes,vipExpireDate from uc_user uu where uu.id != #{id}

select id, username, password, phone, regMail, regIP, salt, nickname, status, createTime, lastUpdate, userPicturePath, maxUserPicturePath, midUserPicturePath, minUserPicturePath, points, exp, vipLevel, usernameModifiedTimes,vipExpireDate from uc_user where id = #{id}

select uu.id, uu.username, uu.phone, uu.regMail, uu.regIP, uu.salt, uu.nickname, uu.status, uu.createTime, uu.lastUpdate, uu.userPicturePath, uu.maxUserPicturePath, uu.midUserPicturePath, uu.minUserPicturePath, uu.points, uu.exp, uu.vipLevel,usernameModifiedTimes,vipExpireDate from uc_user uu, uc_token ut where uu.id=ut.userId and ut.token=#{userToken}
